data.name: Raul Alejandro
data.self_description: Frontend and Experimentation Developer with 2+ years of experience creating new features and make quick fixes through AB tests, personalization campaigns and 100% experiments in thefront store of different e-commerce platforms to increase sales, conversion rates and customer engagement when visiting online stores. I am looking for a new job with new interesting projects where I can continue improving my skills and learning new technologies oriented to web software development with React.js, Redux, SASS and Ruby on Rails

description: Oriented to web development, and computer vision
Work in a interesting project using React library along with Redux, React Router and Jest.
Work with functional and class components, using hooks and error boundaries to control the app.

professional_experience.overview: Setup and development of ABtests and Personalization Campaigns for customer engagement and sales increase in online stores worldwide
accomplishments: Increase performance in a 10% of certain features in the online stores using Javascript, HTML and CSS.
Implement new features within the store front matching comps from UX/UI team with CSS and HTML with pixel perfect design.
Development and setup of ABtests and personalization campaigns with Optimizely platform.
Active code review and experiment setup from my teammates.
Outstanding and constant communication with stakeholders and store owners worldwide.
Analysis of requirements to target right customers in personalization campaigns.

professional_experience.overview: Development and migration of REST API for web applications using Ruby on Rails and PostgreSQL working under Agile methodologies.
accomplishments: Migration from Ruby on Rails v1.5 to Ruby on Rails v5.2 of a REST API platform for a US client involved with car auction sales.
API migration following TDD pattern using RSpect to create unitary tests.
Using Vagrant to create virtual machine container to have a stable development environment.
Actively participation on reviewing Pull Requests from my teammates.

projects.name: Personal Blog
projects.description: Personal blog to show my resume, freelance projects and future open source projects I am planning to work with.
